title: M9: Contrastive Linguistics and MT
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 20 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English, Spanish. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES:  Use a language pair in which the source and target language differ in some well understood way; for example, one language may prefer non-finite subordinate clauses whereas the other may prefer finite subordinate clauses, one may prefer passive voice while the other may use impersonal constructions, etc. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: For suggestions on Spanish/English comparisons, see Elizabeth Enkin & Errapel Mejías-Bikandi. 2016. Using online translators in the second language classroom: Ideas for advanced-level Spanish. LACLIL 9(1). 138-158. DOI:10.5294/laclil.2016.9.1.6.
